item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
item.description: "Eleanor was right. She never looked nice. She looked like art, and art wasn't supposed to look nice; it was supposed to make you feel something." -- Rainbow Rowell

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Amazon Reviewer
item.description: "Fourth, Tobias is a POLITICIAN?!?!?!? Four, the dauntless legend is a politician. Lame. Lastly, that's it? Tris dies, Tobias doesn't get a girlfriend, get married, anything like that, he lives with his mother. Yay!!!!!" -- Amazon Reviewer

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "It's funny how you can forget everything except people loving you. Maybe that's why humans find it so hard getting over love affairs. It's not the pain they're getting over, it's the love." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Kristin Cashore
Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "What do you want from me?" he asks. What I want from every person in my life, I want to tell him. More." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Kristin Cashore
item.description: "Brigan was saying her name, and he was sending her a feeling. It was courage and strength, and something else too, as if he were standing with her, as if he'd taken her within himself, letting her rest her entire body for a moment on his backbone, her mind in his mind, her heart in the fire of his. The fire of Brigan's heart was astounding. Fire understood, and almost could not believe, that the feeling he was sending her was love." -- Kristin Cashore

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Scott Lynch
item.description:
"If you want to write a negative review, don't tickle me gently with your aesthetic displeasure about my work. Unleash the goddamn Kraken."
[on <i>Twitter</i>, July 17, 2012]" -- Scott Lynch

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Lois McMaster Bujold
item.description: "If you can't be seven feet tall, be seven feet smart." -- Lois McMaster Bujold

item.title: Jenn "Awww Yeaaahhh" add a quote by Benjamin Harrison
item.description: "What saddens me most is that some poor woman out there has to be Garth's wife. And his three children -- oh, his poor three children. What a despicable human being this guy is." -- Benjamin Harrison
